document_data.mainbody:
Oskar Fevras was a renowned painter that hailed from Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
He was a thoughtful and contemplative man that still somehow managed to get himself into precarious situations despite not acting rashly.
While he was born a commoner, Oskars artistic talent attracted the attention of the Baldurian nobility.
Oskar fell for a woman that he believed to be the love of his life. All seemed well together until he was courted by Lady Jannath of the Jannath patriar family. Both of Oskars love interests also acted as patrons of his artistic works. Oskar was known to the business with a powerful mummy lord of the Lower City â€“ Mystic Carrion, who procured a torch of revocation for the painter in 1492 DR.
In the , Oskar became torn when he had to choose between the two women in his life, the noblewoman Lady Jannath or the woman that truly held his heart. To clear his mind and think things over, Oskar left the city for the open air of the countryside and began painting. Scandal broke out in the city and news of Oskars affair with Lady Jannath spread.
Unfortunately, with news of Oskars exploits out he made a ripe target for blackmailers and other criminals. He was abducted by a Zhentarim slaver named Brem and taken to the Zhentarim hideout underneath the Waukeens Rest inn.
